review_details: Day spent on a yacht with Dimitrios, This is definitely one of the best exclusive tours you can imagine. We spent about 9 hours on the boat, ate sea delicacies, admired the most beautiful scenery..bathed in a grotto.... met the sunset in a fantastic place! there was an indescribable atmosphere on the yacht!! And amazing music!! And what a delicious fruit salad!!! Thank you for an amazing incredible day!!
